name: mbtiles/icon.mbtiles + mbtiles/text.mbtiles + mbtiles/elevation.mbtiles + mbtiles/land.mbtiles
generator_options: tippecanoe -f -l icon -o mbtiles/icon.mbtiles icon.geojson '--drop-rate=1'; tippecanoe -f -l text -o mbtiles/text.mbtiles text.geojson '--drop-rate=1'; tippecanoe -f -l elevation -o mbtiles/elevation.mbtiles elevation.geojson; tippecanoe -f -l land -o mbtiles/land.mbtiles land.geojson; tile-join -f -o mbtiles/v.mbtiles mbtiles/elevation.mbtiles mbtiles/land.mbtiles mbtiles/icon.mbtiles mbtiles/text.mbtiles; tile-join -f -e v1tiles mbtiles/v.mbtiles --no-tile-compression
json: {"vector_layers": [ { "id": "elevation", "description": "", "minzoom": 3, "maxzoom": 14, "fields": {"alti": "Number"} }, { "id": "icon", "description": "", "minzoom": 0, "maxzoom": 14, "fields": {"ftCode": "String"} }, { "id": "land", "description": "", "minzoom": 4, "maxzoom": 14, "fields": {} }, { "id": "text", "description": "", "minzoom": 0, "maxzoom": 14, "fields": {"ftCode": "String", "kana": "String", "knj": "String"} } ],"tilestats": {"layerCount": 4,"layers": [{"layer": "elevation","count": 96,"geometry": "LineString","attributeCount": 1,"attributes": [{"attribute": "alti","count": 5,"type": "number","values": [100,20,40,60,80],"min": 20,"max": 100}]},{"layer": "icon","count": 91,"geometry": "Point","attributeCount": 1,"attributes": [{"attribute": "ftCode","count": 3,"type": "string","values": ["3221","3231","6321"]}]},{"layer": "land","count": 27,"geometry": "Polygon","attributeCount": 0,"attributes": []},{"layer": "text","count": 30,"geometry": "Point","attributeCount": 3,"attributes": [{"attribute": "ftCode","count": 1,"type": "string","values": [""]},{"attribute": "kana","count": 2,"type": "string","values": ["うたかた","さちのへ"]},{"attribute": "knj","count": 2,"type": "string","values": ["幸舳島","浮方嶋"]}]}]}}
